attributes.action: Ban people from purchasing & letting off fireworks apart from organised events
attributes.additional_details:
Pets are terrified and distressed. 
Farmer’s livestock are worried by them. 
The noise is antisocial.
The times at which people let them off is antisocial. 
People don’t take enough care - they let them off even when it it too window.
Illegal “back of lorry” trade takes place. 
It would be interesting to know through a Freedom of Information Act how much NHs A & E time is used up through “gone wrong” fireworks at homes.
attributes.background: Make it law that fireworks can only be let off at organised and licensed events at guy Fawkes night and New Year’s Eve

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616868
